reviews.text: Please stay away from this station for washing. Praying emblem being wipe away. Pour leather care lotion without drying and my passenger got skin irritation send to hospital, feedback to car wash supervisor and denied EVERYTHING and said is our dog. This pax sat in my car for 6 years no problem but got problem after leather care. Why? Muslim got problems with dogs means dogs always is issues?
Price increase during 10 days before cny. $17 for exterior wash $15 vacuum. Anyhow wash. Rim dirty like never wash. Body still got patches of dirt. Anyhow Wipedown leabing streaks
Super bad experience , paid $18 just for normal car wash, no vacuum , no wax , no clean shine rim and tires . Bad attitude staff, will not be going back again. this is the first and last !

I had a very disappointing experience at this petrol station, which put me in a bad mood:

1. It was raining when I arrived, yet the petrol attendant remained seated and was using a handphone instead of offering assistance promptly, even though I had parked at the pump.

2. After making payment via the Caltex app and driving off, I was stopped by the same attendant, who accused me of not paying. Although an apology was given, it did not make up for the inconvenience and wasted time.

3. To make matters worse, the air pump at the station was out of order, forcing me to drive to a nearby SPC station to pump my tyres.

Considering this poor service, I will avoid this location in the future and visit the Serangoon Caltex station instead.
Uncle is very fast in assisting to pump petrol for me. You can use Caltex Go app to pay and drive off. Very efficient system.
